body:
After a brief offline discussion, this seems like a good idea:

```
x.to(device)
x.to(device, dtype)
x.to(dtype)
x.to(tensor) # moves it to tensor's device and changes it to tensor's dtype
x.to(tensor.device) # moves it to tensor's device
```
